text:
Carnival Cruise Lines will now offer FREE Cruises

This is a satirical website. Don't take it Seriously. It's a joke.

Thursday 06 October 2059 69651 Shares

Carnival is now offering Free Cruises to those effected by the Hurricane. Just call Carnival or Message John Heald and say you want a stress free cruise with ( hash tag) Carnivalfamily and they will have you set up on a 4-7 night cruise of your choice. Just pay taxes and port fees. You also will receive $100 per cabin OBC.



( hash tag) Carnivalfamily

This is a satirical website. Don't take it Seriously. It's a joke.
